TopicTitle: Engine sounds getting silenced after scene change in 1.12.1

Articles.Content:
I'm getting audio glitches since moving to KSP 1.12.2. The worst part of it is loss of engine sounds.

My volume settings are music 0% and all other sounds 50%. Those settings work for a while after a restart, but after an hour or so I lose all engine sounds (rockets, SRBs, jets, and Airplane Plus propellers), and music starts to play in the KSC view. If I check volume settings they appear to be in the correct position yet the game seems to ignore them.

A restart of the game temporarily fixes the problem. I've read accounts of others with this problem in 1.12.x without any recommended fixes. Is this a known 1.12.2 bug and is there any workaround other than restarting the game?
